title: My friend sent me this screenshot.
body:
I blocked out all information/PM's.

https://i.gyazo.com/c584758339dc8cedc0a1bba9703e9f15.png

Context: Someone didn't connect and then someone else was apparently lagging. There was only two people who could actually play the game and the remake vote failed. The game ended up as a 2v5 for the 20 minutes.

replies.body:
Hah! Thats nothing compared to my 1v5 earlier this year. 

At twenty minutes they reconnected and apparently they were all friends playing league at a sleepover, but the internet at there house cut out while we were loading.

> [{quoted}](name=Miicka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ui2HaHIz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-17T06:23:36.644+0000)
>
> Hah! Thats nothing compared to my 1v5 earlier this year. 
> 
> At twenty minutes they reconnected and apparently they were all friends playing league at a sleepover, but the internet at there house cut out while we were loading.

Did they come back and help you win the game? :)

> [{quoted}](name=Third Reich,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ui2HaHIz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-17T08:58:28.353+0000)
>
> Did they come back and help you win the game? :)

Well..... We tried.
I once saw a fizz (back when tank fizz was op) manage to 1v5 my team. He was solo with a 4man premade and they left at around 6-7min in. Longstory short, my team was bad and he managed to still win.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ui2HaHIz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-17T06:44:33.966+0000)
>
> I once saw a fizz (back when tank fizz was op) manage to 1v5 my team. He was solo with a 4man premade and they left at around 6-7min in. Longstory short, my team was bad and he managed to still win.

The sad thing is they would have won 3v5 as the enemy had no idea how to play the game. If the Vayne didn't ragequit at level 3 it would have been an easy win. :( I feel bad for him, to be honest.
